channel.title: twin on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in twin on Joost Plattel

item.title: Thought Kinetics at Coded Matters: Extended Senses
item.description:
Last sunday my brother and I had an exhibition with Thought Kinetics and artist-talk at Coded Matters: Extended Senses. We showed our static prototype exploring the visualization of datasets that are collect and visualized in a static way. This is our first step towards a more realtime system where we can use any data and visualize it on a canvas in an abstract way.
We also gave a talk about our process how we got from a prototype towards a more solid system that uses Node.

item.title: Twins in New York!
item.description: Being in de United States is a perfect excuse for visiting my brother! After enjoying a 5 hour flight (with wifi!) and a delayed subway ride: here's the two of us before the skyline of New York City: I've had 8 days to explore the city, mostly by foot and metro. The first I found the most enjoyable, while the latter turned out to be faster most of the time.
